references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational model for many text-to-image generation models discussed in the paper.
This paper is highly relevant as it proposes a method for removing unsafe concepts from diffusion models, which is the core problem being addressed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This is a highly influential paper on score-based generative models, a class of models that are closely related to diffusion models and which are used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is a significant advancement in text-to-image diffusion models, which directly informs the methods and techniques used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Direct preference optimization: Your language model is secretly a reward model
references.reason: This paper introduces direct preference optimization, which is a key technique used in the current paper to address the concept unlearning problem.
